name: luneo-enterprise-saas
description: Luneo Enterprise SaaS - Plateforme IA de personnalisation de produits

scripts.dev:all: echo '⚠️  ATTENTION: lance TOUT le monorepo (~8 Go RAM minimum). Ctrl+C pour annuler.' && sleep 3 && turbo run dev --concurrency=15
scripts.lint:release: pnpm --filter luneo-frontend lint:check && pnpm --filter @luneo/backend lint:critical && pnpm --filter @luneo/ai-engine lint
scripts.test:release: pnpm --filter luneo-frontend exec vitest run src/app/__tests__/sitemap-canonical.test.ts src/lib/api/__tests__/admin-forward-headers.test.ts && pnpm --filter @luneo/ai-engine test
scripts.type-check:release: pnpm --filter luneo-frontend type-check && pnpm --filter @luneo/backend type-check && pnpm --filter @luneo/ai-engine type-check
scripts.build:release: pnpm --filter luneo-frontend build && pnpm --filter @luneo/backend build && pnpm --filter @luneo/ai-engine build
scripts.quality:release: pnpm run lint:release && pnpm run type-check:release && pnpm run test:release && pnpm run build:release && MIGRATION_VERIFY_REQUIRE_DB=true pnpm run migrate:verify:release && SMOKE_BASE_URL=https://luneo.app SMOKE_REQUIRE_SERVER=true SMOKE_RUN_AUTH_CHECKS=true pnpm run smoke:critical && SMOKE_BASE_URL=https://luneo.app SMOKE_REQUIRE_CREDENTIALS=true pnpm run smoke:post-login-tunnel
scripts.quality:platform: pnpm run lint && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test && pnpm run build
